lines.text: There’ s someone inside, but it's locked
It seems he doesn’t welcome us.
Why? We don’t look like the zombies.
He might not have any ideas how the zombies look like.
It’s a restaurant. So there might be tons in the kitchen.
Do you think he will get out of the bar before being short of food.
Do you mean that people will not die if they are not stubborn?
Everyone is stubborn is some way.
And one’s stubborn might cause another one’s death.
